intro: The Rebirth system is Plants vs Brainrots' primary progression mechanic that resets your progress in exchange for permanent upgrades. Each rebirth makes you stronger while unlocking powerful new features.
note: ðŸŒ± Related Guides: Brainrots Guide | Fuse Recipe | Plants Guide

rebirths.unlocks: Stronger Bat, Fuse Machine, Big Island

sections.title: How Rebirth Works
intro: When you rebirth, you sacrifice specific brainrots and currency to gain permanent bonuses. Your money and brainrot collection reset, but you keep plants and gain lasting improvements that compound over multiple rebirths.

items: All currency (money resets to $0)
All brainrots in collection
Boss levels and spawner upgrades
All plants in your garden
Inventory items and gears
Previous rebirth bonuses (permanent luck/money boosts)
Island expansions
Rebirth 1: Fuse Machine, Stronger Bat, Big Island expansion, Rhino Toasterino boss
Rebirth 2: Stronger Bat, Bigger Island expansion, Esok Sekolah boss
Rebirth 3: Stronger Bat, Chef Cabracadabra boss
Rebirth 4: Stronger Bat, Dragon Cannelloni boss
Rebirth 5: Wardenelli Brickatoni boss

sections.title: Rebirth Strategy

items: Rebirth as soon as you meet the requirements
Earlier rebirths = faster long-term progression
Each rebirth's +50% bonuses compound significantly
Rebuild defense - Buy Cactus plants first for basic income
Use Fuse Machine - Combine brainrots for stronger variants (Rebirth 1+)
Utilize weapons - Clear brainrots faster with your Stronger Bat
Focus on collection - Work toward next rebirth requirements

notes: ðŸ“– Fuse Recipes: See Fuse Recipe Guide for all combination formulas

sections.title: Key Tips
intro: The Rebirth system is your path to true power in Plants vs Brainrots. Each reset makes you permanently stronger!

items: Don't delay - Permanent +50% bonuses make early rebirths very valuable
Save Secret brainrots - Los Tralaleritos and La Tomatoro are needed for Rebirth 2+
Master the Fuse Machine - Essential for creating rare brainrots efficiently
Plan ahead - Start collecting next rebirth requirements immediately
Challenge bosses - Each rebirth unlocks powerful bosses with unique rewards

faqs.question: What happens to my plants when I rebirth?
Do I lose the brainrots I use for rebirth requirements?
When should I do my first rebirth?
